name: Magic Scholar Doris
description: A curious girl continuing her family's research
story: After resolving a problem in a Taranor laboratory, Doris became a magic scholar to continue her father's research. Although she's completely buried in work, she's content now that she's found her life's purpose.

relations.description: Doris is happy to have a friend like Arowell who is always loyal to her, even after her unilateral decision.
Doris used to think of Serila as an object of respect and admiration, but now she considers her a friend and an adviser.
Due to the distance between them, Doris doesn't get the chance to talk to Judith often, but their friendship is still strong.

specialty.name: Persistent Determination
specialty.description: No matter what challenges she faces, she never gives up on her research.

type.name: Gourmet
type.description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.

skills.name: Celebration of Light
skills.description: Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
skills.soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

skills.name: Primal Light
skills.description: Dispels one debuff from an ally with light magic, before recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 35%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
skills.enhanced_description: Dispels one debuff from an ally with light magic, before recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

enhancements.description: Increases Speed.
Increases Speed by 1.
Increases Speed by 3.
Increases Speed by 5.
Increases Mana Bullet's decrease Hit Chance effect chance.
Increases Mana Bullet's decrease Hit Chance effect chance by 1%.
Increases Mana Bullet's decrease Hit Chance effect chance by 3%.
Increases Mana Bullet's decrease Hit Chance effect chance by 5%.
Increases Health.
Increases Health by 2%.
Increases Health by 5%.
Increases Health by 10%.
Recovers Health of all allies after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Recovers Health of all allies by 0.5% after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Recovers Health of all allies by 1% after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Recovers Health of all allies by 2% after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Increases Effect Resistance.
Increases Effect Resistance by 7%.
Increases Effect Resistance by 15%.
Increases Effect Resistance by 25%.
Has a chance to increase Defense of all allies for 1 turn after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Has a 2% chance to increase Defense of all allies for 1 turn after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Has a 5% chance to increase Defense of all allies for 1 turn after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Has a 10% chance to increase Defense of all allies for 1 turn after being attacked by a Dark elemental enemy.
Has a chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 5% after using Mana Bullet.
Has a 20% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 5% after using Mana Bullet.
Has a 50% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 5% after using Mana Bullet.
Has a 100% chance to increase Combat Readiness of the caster by 5% after using Mana Bullet.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 1%.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 2.5%.
Increases Effect Resistance of all allies by 5%.

Has a chance to decrease damage suffered from a critical hit by 30% when attacked by a Dark elemental enemy. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Has a 20% chance to decrease damage suffered from a critical hit by 30% when attacked by a Dark elemental enemy. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Has a 50% chance to decrease damage suffered from a critical hit by 30% when attacked by a Dark elemental enemy. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

Has a 100% chance to decrease damage suffered from a critical hit by 30% when attacked by a Dark elemental enemy. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
When using Primal Light, has a chance to dispel one additional debuff from the target.
When using Primal Light, has a 20% chance to dispel one additional debuff from the target.
When using Primal Light, has a 50% chance to dispel one additional debuff from the target.
When using Primal Light, has a 100% chance to dispel one additional debuff from the target.

buffs.name: Continuous Heal
buffs.effect: Recovers 15% of max Health at the start of every turn. This effect can stack.

skill1.name: 魔力弾
skill1.desc: 敵単体に攻撃し、50.0%の確率で命中率DOWNを1ターンの間付与する。

skill2.name: 光の祝辞
skill2.desc: 味方全体の生命力を回復し、持続回復・防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
skill2.soul_description: 味方全体の生命力を回復し、持続回復・防御力UPを2ターンの間付与する。対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。

skill3.name: 太古の光
skill3.desc: 味方単体の弱体効果を1つ解除し、対象の生命力を回復し、アクションゲージを35%UPさせる。対象の最大生命力が高いほど回復量がUPする。
